name: CbcFullNodeInfo
brief: Complete subproblem state storage (typically for root node)

algorithms.name:
Full State Storage for Root Node
Copyright (C) 2002, IBM Corporation and others. All Rights Reserved.
This code is licensed under the terms of the Eclipse Public License (EPL).

CbcFullNodeInfo stores complete information to recreate a subproblem:
- Full warm start basis
- Complete variable bounds
- All active cutting planes

Used at root node or when incremental storage isn't beneficial.
Child nodes typically use CbcPartialNodeInfo to save memory.

see:
CbcNode for live node information

Edwin 11/24/09 carved from CbcNode
